name: places/ChIJF7DOiBZZwokR4RDwfs6UlI4
formattedAddress: On 6th Ave. Between 56st.&57st, 1395 6th Ave, New York, NY 10019, USA
adrFormatAddress: On 6th Ave. Between 56st.&57st, 1395 6th Ave, New York, NY 10019-3910, USA

originalText.text: This place should definitely be recognized for their craftsmanship for tailoring! Experts in their field for sure! They tailored my very expensive suit pants after multiple failed attempts from a different tailor and they were able to achieve a very excellent fit! They are fairly priced as well as speedy services! I got my pants the next day after being told it would take two days. If you’re looking for quality work for clothing items that you value then this place is a place you can trust. Took my 4 different tailors to find this place and glad I’ve found my goto tailor for any of my suits. Thank you so much!

originalText.text: Carnegie Cleaners has great customer service, quick turnarounds, and professional care. As of July 2023, dry cleaning my blazers was $13 each and they're in fantastic shape. Thank you!

text.text: Carnegie Cleaners has great customer service, quick turnarounds, and professional care. As of July 2023, dry cleaning my blazers was $13 each and they're in fantastic shape. Thank you!

originalText.text:
Reviews aren't really my thing and it's really sad that I have to rate this establishment 3-star as opposed to 5 stars strictly because of an employee's negative and off-putting disposition/attitude as if I shouldn't have been there in the first place...and this is the SECOND time i've encountered him in that manner.

A couple of months ago, I had a shirt that I thought i lost and recently found it and decided to have it dry cleaned. Based on the material, all the other cleaners in the city were a little apprehensive just because of the delicate nature of the top so they did not want risk the chance and declined to clean it. I discovered Carnegie Cleaners (which is a bonus because it's close to my job) and went in and there was one employee who was extremely friendly, outgoing, just really good service and said he would try his best with the shirt which was all i asked, not a big deal.

Went to pick up the shirt a couple days later and WASN'T even greeted by a gentleman with blonde hair who looked directly at me and went back to working at the register, assuming he was preoccupied I did see the other employee who'd helped me days prior and was instantly greeted by him of course with a huge smile but he was with a customer and said the other guy would take care of me and then said "I think we did a good job". I proceeded to walk over to the other guy who then walks away, a little weird because he saw me coming over. FINALLY comes back and doesn't even look up at me, so I then said "I'm sorry, do you work here" and in a mutter-like tone, he said "yes, your ticket please". I asked him if he was okay and he said yes, again no eye contact...got the shirt and yes they did a FANTASTIC job, it looked completely brand new. I was complimenting the job and he just stared like i was an idiot, but I figured maybe he was just having a bad day.

This morning, I had a couple more shirts to bring and was hoping the other guy was there because he was such a delight and of course...it was the blonde guy. So, I thought maybe he might be in a better mood....boy was I wrong! SAME exact disposition, said  nothing when I walked in, continued to looked down at the register..i'm the only one there..and i'm thinking you gotta be kidding me!! Literally stood there for 1 minute and he said NOTHING. I said "HELLO, ARE YOU OPEN"...muttered again, "yes". I had 4 shirts this time but decided to give him one because he had such a nasty attitude and I wanted to get out of there.

I will say this though, the worked they performed was phenomenal!! However, the customer service from that one employee turned me off completely about the whole business and won't be going back which is unfortunate because they are good and priced VERY reasonably for there services.

originalText.text: Had them repair a torn shirt. They did a really nice job. Can’t tell there was ever any damage. The guy who helped was attentive.

text.text: Had them repair a torn shirt. They did a really nice job. Can’t tell there was ever any damage. The guy who helped was attentive.
